text.21_Chapter, 13_Verse: And Abraham named that place, The Lord will see, as it is said to this day: On the mountain, the Lord will be seen.
text.13_Chapter, 17_Verse: And Malchitzedek king of Shalem brought out bread and wine, and he was a priest to the Most High God
text.27_Chapter, 10_Verse: And he arrived at the place and lodged there because the sun had set, and he took some of the stones of the place and placed [them] at his head, and he lay down in that place.
